General.Name: Tekcore Co. Ltd
General.Description: Tekcore Co., Ltd produces and sells LED wafers and chips in Taiwan. It offers standard LEDs, and power and flip chips. The company provides high brightness chips in green, blue, and ultraviolet wavelengths. Its products are used in various applications, including large scale displays and billboards; optic fiber cables; indicator lights; LCD and projection backlighting; low light environments; miniaturized light sources; cell phones, cameras, and other small electronic displays; TV remotes and infrared mouses; signal lights; interior and exterior solid-state lighting and other illuminations; and vehicle lights. Tekcore Co., Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Nantou City, Taiwan.
